translation.en: Yes, yes, yes.
The Golden Eaglets won against Germany with a 2- 0 victory! Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.es: ¡Los Golden Eaglets le ganaron a Alemania dos a cero! ¡Sí!

translation.en: My people, I said you don't know the value of money.
translation.es: Mi gente, dije que no saben el valor del dinero.

translation.en: Good morning.
- My people-- - Welcome, my good child. Welcome!
- A for apple. - A for apple.
translation.es: - A de aguacate. - A de aguacate.

translation.en: - B for ball. - B for ball.
translation.es: - B de balón. - B de balón.

translation.en: - C for cup. - C for cup.
translation.es: - C de café. - C de café.

translation.en: Including this one. Put them together.
The ones on the floor?
Pull it well, pull it.
Dust it off well.
Can you see this one? Shake off all the dust off it.
Then fold it.
- Mommy. - Fold it and align the edges.
Ah! Tolani!
What is wrong? Tell me.
- My darling, what is wrong? -
Eh? What is wrong with you?
You're not talking? Come on.
Ah. You didn't tell me you were coming.
You used to write me letters, I collected them.
translation.es: Solías escribirme cartas. Las tengo todas.

translation.en: - Mother, it's not my fault. - All this time, nothing? That's not nice.
translation.es: - Mamá, no es mi culpa. - Pasó mucho tiempo. No es amable.

translation.en: You didn't even consider that I'd be missing you. Eh?
translation.es: ¿No se te ocurrió que te extrañaría?

translation.en: Tolani, come here, my dear.
Look at how frail you are. What has--
Let me get you water.
Let me get you water.
My darling. Take it.
Well done. Eh!
Look at how thin you are!
What is wrong?
Haven't you been eating?
Is it that you lack food? Or is it money?
translation.es: ¿No tienes comida o no tienes dinero?

translation.en: My God.
Tolani, look me in the eyes.
What is wrong with you? Why are you so thin?
translation.es: ¿Qué te pasa? ¿Por qué estás tan delgada?

translation.en: What is wrong?
Mommy.
- I have suffered. - Ah!
My God.
I have been through so much.
How much for your banana?
Isn't it five kobo?
No, it's too expensive.
So, have you decided what you want to do about Sanwo?
translation.es: Dime, ¿decidiste qué quieres hacer sobre Sanwo?

translation.en: Not yet.
How long have you been in the relationship?
Three years.
Don't ask for my advice if you won't take it.
translation.es: No me pidas consejos si no me escucharás.

translation.en: If I'm dating a man,
translation.es: Si estoy saliendo con un hombre,

translation.en: and in six months he hasn't proposed, hasn't done anything, I'm gonna date other people.
translation.es: y no me pide matrimonio en seis meses, saldré con otra gente.

translation.en: - - You can still take me out to parties,
to the club every Friday, and buy me beer.
translation.es: o a la disco los viernes y comprarme tragos.

translation.en: But you better not wake up Saturday morning and ask me for breakfast.
translation.es: Pero no puede despertarme un sábado y pedirme que prepare el desayuno.

translation.en: Six months, maximum.
War Against Indiscipline.
This is meant to introduce sanity into our lifestyle.
translation.es: Esto debería agregar cordura a nuestro estilo de vida.

translation.en: You will be jailed if you throw litter out of a bus.
translation.es: Si arrojas basura desde un autobús, irás a la cárcel.

translation.en: I was never alone in Lagos.
Not even when I wanted to be.
I always had people around me.
translation.es: Siempre tenía gente a mi alrededor.

translation.en: Far too many.
My roommate Rose was someone I could ask for advice.
translation.es: Podía acudir a mi compañera de casa, Rose, para que me diera consejos.

translation.en: She spoke her mind.
Whether or not I was ready to listen.
translation.es: Estuviera lista para escucharla o no.

translation.en: Though we were in separate departments.
I was in loans.
She was our branch manager's personal secretary.
translation.es: Ella era la secretaria personal del gerente regional.

translation.en: - And she couldn't stand him. - Yes?
Alhaji!
I had no problems with my manager.
translation.es: Yo no tenía problemas con mi gerente.

translation.en: Here's the file, sir. Put it in my office.
translation.es: - Aquí está el archivo, señor. - Déjalo en mi oficina.

translation.en: Okay, sir.
Most days, I didn't see Rose until lunchtime anyway.
translation.es: La mayoría de los días no veía a Rose hasta el almuerzo.

translation.en: We would join the line to buy food with other clerks.
translation.es: Hacíamos la fila para comprar comida con los demás empleados.

translation.en: Like Godwin, a born- again Christian who worked in my department.
translation.es: Como Godwin, un cristiano nacido de nuevo que trabajaba en mi departamento.

translation.en: And Franca, the office gossip.
translation.es: Y Franka, la chismosa de la oficina.

translation.en: Ignatius was the most senior clerk and we all respected him.
translation.es: Ignatius era el empleado más añejo y todos lo respetábamos.

translation.en: He was in charge of maintaining personnel files.
translation.es: Estaba a cargo de los archivos del personal.

translation.en: Hakeem, a bad- tempered man from customer service.
translation.es: Hakeem, un hombre malhumorado de Atención al cliente.

translation.en: ♪ Is it when my water finish? ♪
Oh, Nepa!
I had other tenants who I could turn to,
older women who were more mature.
It's okay.
It's okay now.
There was Mama Chidi,
who had three young children and was heavily pregnant with another.
translation.es: Tenía tres niños pequeños y estaba esperando otro.

translation.en: Mama, the beans are burning.
She loved reading so much
that she would've been a professor in an ideal world.
translation.es: que habría sido maestra en un mundo ideal.

translation.en: Reduce it.
There was Mrs. Durojaye,
but she was usually at work.
translation.es: pero siempre estaba en el trabajo.

translation.en: And the way she disciplined her sons didn't encourage me to approach her.
translation.es: Y su forma de disciplinar a sus hijos no me incitaba a acercármele.

translation.en: You want to be a useless child? You want to kill me? Do you want to kill me? Ah!
I talk and you ignore me.
Try it next time and see what happens. You'll deal with me!
translation.es: ¡Vuelve a intentarlo y verás qué pasa! ¡Vete hacia allá!

translation.en: Go and kneel down over there.
What is the problem? Did I make a mistake giving birth to you?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es el problema? ¿Fue un error traerte a este mundo?

translation.en: Your useless father has gambled all his money! I'm the only one working!
translation.es: ¡El inútil de su padre apostó todo el dinero! ¡Yo soy la única que trabaja! ¡Trabajo mañana, tarde y noche!

translation.en: I work morning, afternoon, night and you won't let me have any peace!
translation.es: ¡Yo soy la única que trabaja! ¡Trabajo mañana, tarde y noche! ¡Y ustedes, niños, no me dan paz!

translation.en: Ayo, can you see your older siblings?
Don't behave like them!
Don't become like them at all. What is it?
Why do I have to yell every day? Are we the only ones who live here?
translation.es: ¡Me tienen gritando todo el día! ¿Es que vivimos solos?

translation.en: - Is this your friend? - My friend Tolani.
Hi Tolani!
- Hi! - Tolani meet…
- What do you want to drink? - Beer.
Sanwo, food is ready.
Mmm. Thank you.
Who shaved your mustache?
You like it, right? It's my new style.
translation.es: Te gusta, ¿no? Es mi nuevo estilo.

translation.en: Your barber must not like you.
Her, concerning the matter of…
my dowry.
What about it?
It's been three years since we started dating.
translation.es: Hace tres años que somos novios.

translation.en: Just last year, you told me to give you some more time.
translation.es: El año pasado, te dije que te daría algo más de tiempo.

translation.en: But, when exactly are you planning to meet my family
translation.es: Pero, de verdad, ¿cuándo quieres conocer a mi familia?

translation.en: so we can make this official?
Let's do the proper thing so you can pay my dowry.
translation.es: Así podremos hacer lo correcto y tú podrás pagar mi dote de novia.

translation.en: I don't understand why it's taking so long. What's wrong?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tardas tanto? ¿Cuál es el problema?

translation.en: I just don't want to end up one of those women who are disappointed by a man.
translation.es: No quiero ser una mujer despechada llorando de pena, ¿sí?

translation.en: Why this talk now?
I'm just telling you this because time is running out.
translation.es: Yo solo lo digo porque el tiempo se acaba.

translation.en: For who? All right. Where would we live?
translation.es: ¿El tiempo de quién? Muy bien. ¿Dónde viviríamos?

translation.en: We will live together like every married couple.
Do you know how much rent is in this town?
translation.es: - ¿Sabes cuánto cuesta la renta aquí? - No.

translation.en: Don't I live in the same Lagos as you, hustling every day?
translation.es: - ¿Sabes cuánto cuesta la renta aquí? - No. No, porque no vivo en el mismo Lagos, no trabajo aquí.

translation.en: Do I live in Oshogbo?
Uh… even Rose, she said I should give you six months maximum.
translation.es: Hasta Rose dijo que debería darte seis meses como máximo.

translation.en: And if you're not ready, maybe I should break up with you.
translation.es: Y que si no estás listo, debería dejarte.

translation.en: - You better not listen to her. - Hmm.
She's just jealous.
- Jealous of what? - Uh.
She sees that you're in a steady relationship and she can't take it.
translation.es: Ve que estás en una relación estable y eso no la hace feliz.

translation.en: She has never liked me from the very start.
translation.es: No le agradé desde el principio.

translation.en: Somebody that can't keep a man, that's who gives you advice?
translation.es: Si no puede conservar a un hombre, no debería dar consejos.

translation.en: All right.
What about your uncle?
The one that sends you on errands, then gives you little or no money afterward.
translation.es: Te hace trabajar y luego te da poco y nada de dinero.

translation.en: But when he wants to go to England and America,
translation.es: Pero cuando él quiere ir a Inglaterra o Estados Unidos,

translation.en: he will get on a first class plane.
translation.es: se monta a un avión de primera clase.

translation.en: When he wants to travel within Nigeria, he will call you,
translation.es: Cuando quiere viajar dentro de Nigeria, te llama a ti.

translation.en: Sanwo, let's go. Why is that? Why?
translation.es: Sanwo, vamos. ¿Por qué pasa eso? ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Go and ask him.
- I should go and ask him? - Mm.
Is that someone that wishes you well?
translation.es: ¿Una persona así te desea el bien?

translation.en: Look, Tolani. Leave my uncle out of this. You hear?
translation.es: Escucha, Tolani. No metas a mi tío en esto. ¿Me oíste?

translation.en: - I'm sure it's because of his wife. - Mm.
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que es culpa de la esposa.

translation.en: Sure, she's to blame. That's true.
translation.es: Claro, es culpa de ella. Es verdad.

translation.en: - She's the one. - Mm.
I'm not even here to discuss that either.
translation.es: Tampoco vine aquí para discutir eso.

translation.en: The discussion is two ways now, hmm?
You've said your speech, let me say my own.
translation.es: Tú dijiste tu discurso. Ahora déjame decir el mío.

translation.en: Talk.
I'm listening.
I know you're getting frustrated.
- I'm working on a new deal. - Ha.
- This one is different. - I said I don't want to hear it. Ah.
translation.es: - Esto es diferente. - Dije que no quiero escucharlo.

translation.en: That's fine then.
Are you upset?
All right, what deal?
- All you have to know is it's risk- free. - Mm..
translation.es: Solo debes saber que no tiene riesgo.

translation.en: Tolani, I won't disappoint you. I'm not a bastard.
translation.es: Tolani, no te defraudaré. No soy un maldito.

translation.en: - I'd like to believe so. - I'm just playing with you.
translation.es: - Te lo recordaré. - Solo estoy molestándote.

translation.en: - Come here. - Leave me alone.
- My sister. - Uncle.
Have you heard?
- Salako sacked Rose. - What! Why?
She slapped him.
It was from Franca I heard it.
- When? - Thirty minutes ago.
But you know what? I will confirm it once I discuss her case with my madam.
translation.es: Pero ¿sabes? Lo confirmaré luego de hablar del caso con la señora.

translation.en: How come Franca was the first to hear?
Ah, I don't know,
but you know that all bad news comes from that woman's mouth.
translation.es: pero sabes que todas las malas noticias provienen de su boca.

translation.en: She must be lying.
Well, she swears that she saw them with her two naked eyes.
translation.es: Ella jura que lo vio con sus propios ojos.

translation.en: So where is Rose now?
She left.
I only came to tell you because you're her friend.
translation.es: Vine a decírtelo porque eres su amiga.

translation.en: Thank you.
Had I been around, she wouldn't have done it.
translation.es: Si yo hubiese estado ahí, ella no lo habría hecho.

translation.en: How?
I would have calmed her down.
It was about time. Rose does not know how to control herself.
translation.es: Ya era hora. Rose no sabe controlarse.

translation.en: How?
And Salako has been letting her get away with it?
- That's it. - How?
We should pray for her.
Pray for who? Everybody knows she's Salako's girlfriend.
translation.es: ¿Rezar por quién? Todos saben que es la novia de Salako.

translation.en: - Ah, is that new? -
Ah, Tolani, how are you?
- Have you heard? - Heard what?
Don't bear false witness.
Face your food, pastor. Who is talking to you?
translation.es: Mire su plato, Pastor. ¿Quién te habla a ti?

translation.en: It's Rose's concern and no one else's.
translation.es: Es asunto de Rose y de nadie más.

translation.en: Just be talking anyhow.
Me, I like her, I'm just concerned.
translation.es: Ella me agrada. Solo estoy preocupada.

translation.en: Who else was there apart from Ignatius?
Um, Godwin. But he was all right.
Hakeem too was trying to open his mouth, but Franca was the actual devil.
translation.es: Hakeem también intentó comentar pero el verdadero diablo fue Franka.

translation.en: She was lucky I wasn't there to deal with her.
translation.es: Mejor para ella que yo no estuviera.

translation.en: It's her type that sleeps with useless men like Salako.
translation.es: Es la clase de persona que se acuesta con inútiles como Salako.

translation.en: Why did he sack you?
Because he is a bastard.
It won't end well for him, the stress he put me through at that bank.
translation.es: Se le arruinará la vida por todo lo que me hizo hacer en ese banco.

translation.en: He touched me up and down.
Did you slap him?
Why does it matter?
Why now Rose? Why?
Tolani, because women like me and you never get justice in this country.
translation.es: Tolani, porque este país no es justo para las mujeres como nosotras.

translation.en: Only criminals get justice.
Look at him. Can't you see how corrupt he is?
He steals from the bank, steals from the customers
translation.es: Le roba al banco, a los clientes y acepta coimas.

translation.en: Him and that snake Umar.
translation.es: Él y la víbora de Umar.

translation.en: Forget that one.
Umar is a part of it, he's a part too!.
Those bad debt letters you've been typing, you think they'll be repaid?
translation.es: Esas cartas de créditos que has escrito, ¿crees que serán pagadas?

translation.en: Salako opens an account for a big man
translation.es: Salako abre una cuenta para un hombre rico

translation.en: and Umar gives the big man a loan.
translation.es: y Umar le da un préstamo al hombre rico.

translation.en: - Hmm. - Big man then gives them both a cut.
translation.es: El hombre rico les paga a ambos.

translation.en: But the three of them know the loan will never be repaid.
translation.es: Pero los tres saben que nadie pagará ese préstamo.

translation.en: What you think happens with those dormant accounts?
translation.es: ¿Qué crees que pasa con las cuentas inactivas?

translation.en: Salako is using them as his personal accounts.
translation.es: Él las convirtió en cuentas personales.

translation.en: It's why he's early every morning.
So he can steal from them.
The government ministers steal, even the president steals.
translation.es: Los ministros roban, hasta los presidentes roban.

translation.en: Then you toil and work hard,
translation.es: Y tú sufres y trabajas mucho,

translation.en: but still can't afford to buy meat to put in your lunch in the afternoon.
translation.es: pero aún así no te alcanza para comprar carne para tu almuerzo.

translation.en: If I ever see that man again, I will deal with him.
translation.es: Si lo vuelvo a ver alguna vez, me encargaré de él.

translation.en: Please my sister, just take it easy.
My work of seven years. Seven years.
Show me one person that can type faster in that bank.
translation.es: ¿Quién escribe más rápido que yo en ese banco?

translation.en: Show me one person whose shorthand is better than mine. Show me!
translation.es: ¿Quién es mejor en taquigrafía que yo ahí? ¡Dime!

translation.en: So what are you going to do now?
Don't worry. I'll take care of myself.
Our rent is due.
I'll talk to Vali-- Violet.
Violet? Are you sure?
Yes, if I can't ask her for money, who else can I ask?
translation.es: Sí, si no le pido dinero a ella, ¿a quién?

translation.en: Ah. Okay.
Have you eaten?
I don't feel like eating.
- Come stai? - Va bene.
Bellissima.
Oh, grazie, you speak Italiano?
Ah, I stayed in Italy.
You know, when I was in Italy, I went to their Vasasi store.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Cuando estuve en Italia, fui a la tienda de Vasasi.

translation.en: - Versace. - Ah.
Ah! Mamma mia, very good fashion.
Ah, I'm telling you, I stayed in Italy.
translation.es: Te digo que estuve en Italia.

translation.en: All right.
Yes.
- - Morning.
Aunty.
Morning sister Vio.
Good morning. Rose. Why are you here?
I need to talk to you.
Go wait for me.
Go wait for me now.
- Hi there. - Hey, aunty.
- I'll be back soon, hmm? Pronto. -
Mabel!
You see this one? Hmm? Just this one.
- Yes. - You finish loosening it.
- Okay, ma. - I'll be right back.
- Pronto. - No problem.
Rose, what is it?
I want to borrow some money.
- I don't have money. - How?
I don't have money.
Why didn't you ask Tolani?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no le pides a Tolani?

translation.en: Why would I ask her? Is she my relative?
Anyway, I don't have money.
translation.es: De todos modos, no tengo dinero.

translation.en: I've come all this way!
- You should've called. - What phone am I going to use?
translation.es: Deberías haber llamado antes. - ¿Con qué teléfono? - ¿No hay en tu zona?

translation.en: - Aren't there call centers in your area? - There are no working lines in my area.
translation.es: - ¿Con qué teléfono? - ¿No hay en tu zona? - Por favor, no funciona ninguno allí. - Rose, no tengo dinero.

translation.en: Rose, I don't have money.
translation.es: - Por favor, no funciona ninguno allí. - Rose, no tengo dinero.

translation.en: I don't have. Can you hear me?
The last time I borrowed you money, it took you a long time to return my money.
translation.es: La última vez que te presté dinero, tardaste una eternidad en devolvérmelo.

translation.en: Therefore, I don't have money to give you.
translation.es: Por lo tanto, no tengo dinero para darte.

translation.en: But Fedele sends you money every month.
translation.es: Fedele te envía dinero todos los meses.

translation.en: For his daughter. In foreign currency?
See, we are talking of lira. Lira is not that strong.
translation.es: Mira, hablamos de la lira. No es una moneda tan fuerte.

translation.en: It's not like we are talking about dollars or pounds sterling.
translation.es: No estamos hablando de dólares ni libras esterlinas.

translation.en: But you have money to live in Keffi and to rent a shop in Onikan?
translation.es: ¿Pero te alcanza para vivir en Keffi y alquilar un local en Onikan?

translation.en: Will you behave yourself?
I don't have time for this nonsense.
What is the matter with you? I don't have money to lend you.
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que te pasa? Dije que no tengo dinero para darte.

translation.en: The only thing I can do is,
give you a little bit, you know, something to get you by.
translation.es: es darte un poco, algo para que te las arregles.

translation.en: Sisi said we should help each other. That's what she said.
translation.es: Sisi dijo que siempre deberíamos ayudarnos. Eso dijo ella.

translation.en: Sisi can say whatever she likes!
- Really! - Yes! What? It's the truth.
Ah- ah. Sisi can say whatever she wants.
translation.es: Sisi puede decir lo que quiera.

translation.en: That's small town talk. Let me tell you.
Sisi had so many children. In fact, too many and she can't afford them.
translation.es: Sisi tenía tantos hijos que no le alcanzaba el dinero.

translation.en: If it wasn't for my father, I wouldn't have gone to Italy.
translation.es: Si no fuera por mi padre, no había ido a Italia.

translation.en: I wouldn't have met Fedele. I wouldn't have had my child.
translation.es: No habría conocido a Fedele. No habría tenido a mi hijo.

translation.en: In fact, I wouldn't be sitting here today.
translation.es: De hecho, no habría logrado nada de todo esto.

translation.en: Vio, you'll never see me insulting Sisi.
translation.es: Vio, nunca me escuchaste insultar a Sisi así.

translation.en: My dad paid for my secretarial studies, if you don't know.
translation.es: Y mi padre pagó por mi secretariado, por si no sabías.

translation.en: I know. That's the only thing he could help her with.
translation.es: Lo sé. Es lo único con lo que pudo ayudar.

translation.en: Don't insult my father, don't try it. Don't even go there.
translation.es: No insultes a mi padre, ni lo intentes. Ni se te ocurra.

translation.en: - My father was a generous man. - Hm. Generous indeed.
translation.es: - Mi padre era un hombre generoso. - Sí, muy generoso.

translation.en: The only thing is that his salary as a teacher
translation.es: Solo que con su sueldo de maestro no podía darse muchos lujos.

translation.en: didn't afford him any luxuries. Just the little things--
translation.es: Solo que con su sueldo de maestro no podía darse muchos lujos. Solo unos pocos…

translation.en: Ah, Violet you have-- you have a bad mouth! You talk nonsense.
translation.es: Vio, ¡qué mala eres! ¡Qué ruda eres! Hablas sin sentido.

translation.en: - What about yours? - Sisi said it! You have a bad mouth.
translation.es: - ¿Y qué tal tú? - Sisi dijo eres grosera.

translation.en: And yours isn't uncouth? Look at you, hypocrite. Am I your senior?
translation.es: ¿Y tú? ¡Eres una hipócrita! ¿Acaso soy tu amiga?

translation.en: Don't be rude to me. But really, weren't we brought up together?
translation.es: No seas grosera. Pero en serio, ¿no nos criamos juntas?

translation.en: Tell me, were we not raised the same way?
translation.es: Dime, ¿no fuimos criadas del mismo modo?

translation.en: Didn't we drink garri and water together?
Hmm? Rose, I don't have money. Am I clear?
Oh, so now you've become a big woman in Lagos.
translation.es: Así que ahora eres importante en Lagos, ¿no?

translation.en: No problem. Everybody has their time.
translation.es: No hay problema. Todos tienen su momento.

translation.en: I don't have money.
Chukwuebuka!  Ma!
Bring what I asked you to bring for me.
♪ If you want to marry a woman ♪
translation.es: Si quieres casarte con una mujer…

translation.en: - Mama Chidi. - Please go and bring the second one.
translation.es: - Mamá Chidi. - Por favor, ve a traer el segundo.

translation.en: Mrs. Durojaye.
- How are you? - I'm fine, welcome.
I admire your car.
It takes you out and brings you back.
translation.es: Te lleva y te trae a donde vayas.

translation.en: It really helps. Mama Chidi, to have a car really helps.
translation.es: De verdad me ayuda. Mamá Chidi, tener un auto ayuda mucho.

translation.en: Hey, I can't forget when the last one finally broke down.
translation.es: No me olvido cuando se descompuso el anterior.

translation.en: Ah! Mama Chidi, I struggled.
translation.es: ¡Ah, mamá Chidi! Sí que era difícil.

translation.en: But we thank God. We thank God.
translation.es: Pero gracias a Dios. Gracias a Dios.

translation.en: My sister, maybe one day Papa Chidi too will be able to buy one.
translation.es: Hermana… quizá algún día papá Chidi pueda comprar uno.

translation.en: What are you thinking? It's fairly used.
- Really? - Yes. Imported.
My sister, I'll be happy with any one,
translation.es: Hermana, yo me alegraría con cualquiera,

translation.en: whether it's used or an imported car.
As long as it's from overseas, it's okay.
translation.es: Siempre y cuando sea del exterior, está bien.

translation.en: But see, you will have to wait till after twelve noon
translation.es: Pero verás, tendrás que esperar hasta el mediodía

translation.en: on sanitation day before you go out.
translation.es: en día de saneamiento ambiental para poder salir.

translation.en: And if you must get a number plate license,
translation.es: Y necesitas obtener el número de placa,

translation.en: it has to be the type of mine, an odd number.
translation.es: asegúrate de que sea como el mío, un número impar.

translation.en: So that you can at least go out three times in a week.
translation.es: Así al menos puedes salir tres veces a la semana.

translation.en: Even me during weekdays, I wake up very, very early.
translation.es: Incluso yo, los días de semana, me levanto muy temprano,

translation.en: As early as 5:00 a.m. to go out.
translation.es: a las cinco de la mañana, para salir.

translation.en: Because anything after 7:00, that's another problem.
translation.es: Porque después de la siete, ya es otro problema.

translation.en: That is a good thing.
- Ah- ah. Rose. Welcome. How are you? - Mama Chidi.
I'm fine, how are your children?
We thank God. We're planning to cook beans today.
translation.es: Bien, a Dios gracias. Cocinaremos habas hoy.

translation.en: How is Papa Chidi?
He's fine, thanks to God. Welcome, eh.
translation.es: Él está bien, gracias a Dios. Bienvenida.

translation.en: Well done.
Rubbish.
An extremely useless individual.
translation.es: Una tonta inservible que no vale nada.

translation.en: Worthless and no use to anyone.
- Okay, Mama Chidi. - Hm? I'm going inside.
translation.es: Bueno, mamá Chidi, voy para adentro.

translation.en: Let me go and remove my drawers, I'm sweating.
translation.es: Iré a quitarme las medias, estoy sudando.

translation.en: Okay.
Chukwuebuka!
What a pity.
Not at all, Vio is wicked. Sisi told me already.
translation.es: Para nada, Vio es malvada. Sisi ya me lo había dicho.

translation.en: She said if Vio saw her injured on the road,
translation.es: Dijo que si Vio la veía moribunda en la calle

translation.en: she'd leave her to die.
At least she should send money to your mother now.
translation.es: Al menos debería enviarle dinero a tu madre.

translation.en: What? What are you saying?
Sisi has never gotten even one single kobo from Vio since she came back from Italy.
translation.es: Sisi no recibió un centavo de Vio desde que regresó de Italia.

translation.en: For real?
She only knows how to shout mamma mia, when she has customers.
translation.es: Solo sabe gritar mamma mia cuando tiene clientes.

translation.en: She doesn't want anyone to know we're sisters.
translation.es: No quiere que se sepa que soy su hermana.

translation.en: She doesn't understand any Italian! She doesn't, she's just pretending.
And she met Fedele when she was cleaning his house!
translation.es: Y conoció a Fedele cuando limpiaba su casa, así se conocieron.

translation.en: Please, I'm starting to have a headache.
translation.es: Por favor, me empieza a doler la cabeza.

translation.en: This world…
I'm thinking maybe I should even be grateful.
That Mrs., uh…
Whatever she calls herself. Her.
translation.es: Como se llame. Ella. Un día matará a sus hijos con sus propias manos.

translation.en: One day she'll kill one of her children.
translation.es: Ella. Un día matará a sus hijos con sus propias manos.

translation.en: When I passed her just now,
she was giving me the stink eye, like I stole her husband.
translation.es: y me miró mal, como si le hubiera robado al marido.

translation.en: - - No wonder the man divorced her.
Who wants to wake up to such an angry face every day?
translation.es: ¿Quién quiere ver esa cara de enojo todas las mañanas?

translation.en: One day she'll kill one of her children.
translation.es: Matará a sus hijos algún día.

translation.en: Is there any food?
Umar. That is it, see me later in my office.
translation.es: Umar, es todo. Ven a verme a mi oficina luego.

translation.en: - Tolani. - Yes, sir?
See me in my office.
Mr. Salako has requested that you be transferred downstairs, to work with him.
translation.es: El señor Salako pidió tu transferencia al piso de abajo para trabajar con él.

translation.en: Why, sir?
He wants someone from within the bank to replace his secretary.
translation.es: Quiere que alguien interno del banco reemplace a su secretaria.

translation.en: I've told him that you'll be available from tomorrow.
translation.es: Le dije que estarás disponible desde mañana.

translation.en: I want you to clean out your desk today and report to him downstairs.
translation.es: Quiero que despejes tu escritorio hoy y te reportes a él.

translation.en: But I have plenty of letters to type, sir.
translation.es: Tengo muchas cartas que escribir, señor.

translation.en: What letters?
Bad debts. There's so many of them and…
translation.es: Las de acreedores. Hay muchas y…

translation.en: Sir, please, I like it here in loans.
translation.es: Señor, por favor. Me gusta trabajar en Préstamos.

translation.en: Mr. Salako has requested that you be transferred.
translation.es: El señor Salako solicitó tu traspaso.

translation.en: Yes.
Come in.
Alhaji Umar said I should report to you sir.
translation.es: Alhaji Umar dijo que me reportara con usted.

translation.en: Hm, yes, um, Miss Ajao.
I had a meeting with him regarding,
translation.es: Tuve una reunión con él sobre…

translation.en: my former secretary. What's her name?
What's her name again?
- Rose Adamson, sir. - Mm- hmm!
I think you are the suitable person for that… office.
translation.es: Creo que eres la persona adecuada para la oficina.

translation.en: Because whenever I see you, you always appear neat. Very neat.
translation.es: Porque siempre que te veo, te ves prolija, muy prolija.

translation.en: Eh. And you're a Yoruba girl?
- Yes sir. - Okay.
Please, you are from where?
Makoku, sir.
Makoku. Makoku interior I guess.
We're not interior people. We're Egba, sir.
translation.es: No somos del interior. Somos egba, señor.

translation.en: Did you say Egba?
Yes, sir.
Okay. What does your father do?
translation.es: Bien, ¿a qué se dedica tu padre?

translation.en: My father was a drummer sir.
Was a drummer? Oh.
He's passed on. What a pity. May God grant him heavenly rest.
translation.es: Falleció. Lo siento. Que Dios lo tenga en la gloria.

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
God grant him heavenly rest. And your mother?
My mother makes adire. She's a cloth dyer sir.
translation.es: Mi madre hace adire. Tiñe las telas, señor.

translation.en: Hm. I see. I see. Whatever, they raised you well.
translation.es: Ya veo. Como sea, te criaron bien.

translation.en: You have manners.
Anyway, what about your diction?
Diction, English. My diction, sir?
Your diction! Ah, don't you understand English?
How do you… do you speak and write?
My diction is fine, sir.
Uh, what… whatever, let's give it to Rose. Hm.
Her English grammar, diction
were excellent. Very excellent.
Anyway, you will go to her desk now, clean the desk for me.
translation.es: En fin, usarás su escritorio ahora. Límpialo, por favor.

translation.en: Because the last time I tried to check the desk,
translation.es: Porque la última vez que vi ese escritorio,

translation.en: the whole place looked horrible.
translation.es: todo el espacio se veía horrible.

translation.en: Like, uh, she packed a lot of juju there.
- Juju? - Yes, juju. Hmm.
Like you don't know what juju is.
translation.es: Como si no supieras lo que es.

translation.en: - Go and clean the place. -
Hello.
Hello, sir.
Yes, sir. Yes, sir.
You don't know my job, you don't know what my job entails.
translation.es: No sabes hacer mi trabajo, ni lo que implica.

translation.en: You don't know anything.
There's nothing that entails anything in that… in that bank.
translation.es: Nada implica nada en ese banco.

translation.en: All the work I was doing for Alhaji Umar last week, he didn't even know.
translation.es: Todo el trabajo que hice para Alhaji Umar la semana pasada, ni lo sabía.

translation.en: What could it possibly entail?
You say hello to a customer, the customer says hello to you. Finish!
translation.es: Le dices hola a un cliente, el cliente te responde hola, ¡listo!

translation.en: No. Tolani, no.
Look, when a customer comes in or they call on the phone,
translation.es: Cuando un cliente viene o llama por teléfono,

translation.en: the way you interact with them
should make them relaxed and very comfortable.
I did all this there.
I don't want to.
So why not tell him you didn't want the job?
How?
This man knows what he's doing.
He's doing it because he knows we live together.
translation.es: Sabe lo que hace porque sabe que vivimos juntas.

translation.en: He wants me to come and beg him.
Over my dead body. I'll never go beg him.
translation.es: Sobre mi cadáver. No le rogaré nada.

translation.en: Is he that scared of juju?
translation.es: ¿Tanto miedo le tiene a las malas energías?

translation.en: That man? He's worse than an illiterate.
translation.es: ¿Ese hombre? Es peor que un analfabeto.

translation.en: And that smell in his office, what is it?
translation.es: ¿Y qué es ese olor en su oficina?

translation.en: He farts. He farts a lot.
You'll get used to it.
And you'll get used to it when he starts touching you.
translation.es: Y te acostumbrarás a que te manosee también.

translation.en: God forbid.
Johnny, Johnny.
Ah, Rambling Rose! Don't contaminate this contraband.
translation.es: ¡La inquieta Rose! No me contamines el contrabando.

translation.en: You never ask after me.
- Do you ask? - This is my only wife in Lagos.
translation.es: - ¿Y tú? - Es mi única esposa en Lagos.

translation.en: So tell me, where are you guys rambling to today?
We want to buy shoes, but your shoes are always too expensive…
translation.es: Queremos comprar zapatos, pero los vendes muy caros.

translation.en: Is that so!
So that's why you never patronize me. No problem.
translation.es: Por eso no te consentimos. No hay problema.

translation.en: This is my friend, I'm taking him to a boutique.
translation.es: Él es mi amigo. Lo llevaré a esa boutique.

translation.en: You know he doesn't shop around here. We need to upgrade.
translation.es: Sabes que no compra aquí. Necesitamos mejorar.

translation.en: Hello.
Eh, O to the C! OC Money!
You see these two, they're my favorite customers in Lagos.
translation.es: ¿Ves a estas damas? Mis clientas favoritas en Lagos.

translation.en: Now see this one, he's an original fly guy!
translation.es: ¿Lo ven a él? ¡Es un tipo genial!

translation.en: He just came back from United States.
translation.es: Acaba de regresar de Estados Unidos.

translation.en: - Of America? - Is there another one?
Really? Okay then.
- This one is your size. - Buy these for me.
translation.es: - Estos son de tu talla. - Cómpramelos.

translation.en: - You mean this? - Hm.
Baby, see. Austerity measures.
Ah, Johnny, you haven't changed, you're still stingy,
translation.es: Johnny, nunca cambias. Eres un tacaño.

translation.en: Please leave my shoes.
- How much is it? - Five naira, that seven naira.
- How much? - I'll pay two naira fifty kobo.
Seven naira.
I'm paying two naira, 50 kobo.
- Did you tell her five? - It's seven.
It's seven naira.
- Five naira. - Five for the two of them.
No. Okay, you pay six naira.
translation.es: No, no. Bueno, págame seis nairas.

translation.en: - We don't have that. Two naira, 50 kobo. - No.
translation.es: - No tenemos. Dos con cincuenta. - Ahora no.

translation.en: - Hey Johnny! - Yes?
No time, you know. I'll pay.
translation.es: No hay tiempo, sabes. Yo pagaré.

translation.en: - OC Money! - It's all good.
Okay! Put it in a bag.
Thank you. My name is Rose.
My name is OC. But my friends call me OC Money.
translation.es: Me llamo O. C. pero mis amigos me dicen O. C. Money.

translation.en: What are you doing with this person, he doesn't like spending money.
translation.es: ¿Por qué te juntas con él? No le gusta gastar dinero.

translation.en: He's a cool guy, you know, very cool guy.
translation.es: Es un tipo genial. Muy genial.

translation.en: Can I come visit you?
Sure.
All right, you should give me your address.
translation.es: Muy bien, deberías darme tu dirección.

translation.en: - My address? - Yes.
- So, we'll see. - Yeah.
- Take care. - Yeah.
He's nice.
- Who? - Uh- uh.
- OC now. - You don't know him, let's go.
translation.es: - O. C. - No lo conoces. Vamos.

translation.en: You?
Come in.
Please make yourself comfortable.
Here we are.
So what can I offer you?
Beer.
What is it?
Let me get you some wine instead.
No, I only drink beer.
It's not ladylike.
translation.es: No es digno de una dama.

translation.en: Wine is better, trust me.
translation.es: El vino es mejor, confía en mí.

translation.en: I'll drink whatever you give me.
translation.es: Bien, dame lo que quieras, lo beberé.

translation.en: Wine it is. I'll be right back.
Ah, you should've seen OC's house, there's no gadget he doesn't have.
translation.es: Deberías ver la casa de O. C. Tenía todos los aparatos electrónicos.

translation.en: And he's as generous as my father.
translation.es: Y es muy generoso, como mi padre.

translation.en: Can you imagine?
When I was there, what's his name… Johnny came by.
He started asking me questions when OC went to the kitchen.
translation.es: Me hizo muchas preguntas cuando O. C. se metió en la cocina.

translation.en: - Okay, so feel free okay? - Okay.
what is going on between you and him?
How is it your business?
I just ignored him. Nonsense.
He claims he is into import and export
translation.es: En fin, dijo que era exportador importador

translation.en: and yet he never bought me even a drink when we were dating.
translation.es: y sin embargo no me pagó ni un trago cuando salíamos.

translation.en: But now he wants to monitor me, asking silly questions. Please.
translation.es: Ahora quiere vigilar mis movimientos, haciendo preguntas tontas. Por favor.

translation.en: OC is his friend.
And so? Hasn't it been long enough since we dated?
translation.es: ¿Y qué? ¿No pasó tiempo ya desde que salíamos?

translation.en: He doesn't own me, I can do anything I want.
translation.es: No es mi dueño. Puedo hacer lo que quiera.

translation.en: He probably has many girlfriends. You know how he is.
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuántas novias tuvo ya? Sabes cómo es.

translation.en: Please, let me drink my wine.
translation.es: Por favor, déjame beber mi vino.

translation.en: OC said I should stop drinking beer.
translation.es: O. C. dijo que debía dejar de beber cerveza.

translation.en: Uh. Please, uh, get me that file. Okay, sir.
translation.es: - Por favor, tráeme el archivo. - Sí, señor.

translation.en: Here it is, sir.
Thank you.
OC it was a struggle coming here today.
translation.es: O. C., me fue difícil venir hoy aquí.

translation.en: I really struggled.
So if you want to see me again,
translation.es: Así que si quieres volver a verme,

translation.en: you'll have to start giving me taxi money.
translation.es: deberás comenzar a pagarme el taxi.

translation.en: And I mean the proper taxis, not those rickety ones.
translation.es: Y no cualquier taxi, los de verdad, no los desvencijados.

translation.en: That's no problem, you know.
Thank you. Because I have no money left.
translation.es: Gracias. Porque ya me quedé sin dinero otra vez.

translation.en: I don't even have money for rent.
translation.es: Ni siquiera tengo para la renta.

translation.en: That's no problem too, I'll take care of that.
translation.es: No es problema tampoco. Yo me encargo de eso.

translation.en: Thank you.
You know, while you're at it, don't you think you need new shoes?
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Ya que estamos, ¿no crees que necesitas zapatos nuevos?

translation.en: Uh- uh. Why?
Your shoe is old.
From trekking now.
Your friend was right, you know? You should start wearing better shoes.
translation.es: Tu amiga tiene razón. Deberías usar zapatos mejores.

translation.en: Who has time to wear high heels everywhere?
translation.es: Por favor, no tengo tiempo de vivir en tacones.

translation.en: I'm only offering.
If you want to buy, no problem.
Buy, I won't say no. As long as it's free.
translation.es: Hazlo, no diré que no. Si son gratis.

translation.en: Not exactly.
How?
You will have to do something for me.
translation.es: Tendrás que hacer algo por mí.

translation.en: Your shoes are nice.
Really? You can have any you want.
They're not my size.
Just tired. Today I did a lot of shopping.
translation.es: Estoy cansada. Hoy fui de compras.

translation.en: I shopped.
When are you going to start looking for another job?
Uh- uh. Why?
I'm just saying, you don't want to get used to being at home for too long.
translation.es: Solo digo, no te conviene acostumbrarte a estar en casa demasiado tiempo.

translation.en: Ah, I'm not… I'm not looking for a job. I don't want to work again.
translation.es: No estoy buscando empleo. No quiero volver a trabajar.

translation.en: OC said I shouldn't work, that he'll take care of me.
translation.es: O. C. dice que no debería trabajar. Él cuidará de mí.

translation.en: He even asked me to move in with him.
translation.es: Hasta dijo que debería mudarme con él.

translation.en: What?
But I told him I wasn't ready.
translation.es: Pero le dije que no estaba lista.

translation.en: He said I'm the kind of woman he would like to marry.
translation.es: Dijo que soy la clase de mujer con quien le gustaría casarse.

translation.en: - When? - Today.
After how many days of knowing you?
Let me tell you something. You are not a child!
translation.es: Déjame decirte algo. ¡No eres una niña!

translation.en: You cannot move into a house with a man you barely know. Or marry him.
translation.es: No puedes mudarte con un hombre que apenas conoces, ni casarte con él.

translation.en: Anybody who does that kind of thing is clearly asking for trouble.
translation.es: Cualquiera que haga algo así, se está buscando problemas.

translation.en: No quarrel, is it your problem?
Is it not my trouble?
It's your problem.
Silly girl.
Why are you so upset about it?
You know what baffles me the most about this whole thing?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué es lo que menos entiendo de todo esto?

translation.en: It's that it's been just three weeks since they started dating.
translation.es: Es que han pasado solo tres semanas desde que se conocieron y él ya está hablando de matrimonio.

translation.en: He's already talking about marriage.
translation.es: desde que se conocieron y él ya está hablando de matrimonio.

translation.en: Look, Tolani, why don't you stop focusing on those people's business?
translation.es: Mira, Tolani, ¿por qué no dejas de preocuparte por asuntos ajenos?

translation.en: Okay.
She doesn't work, she doesn't do anything.
translation.es: Ella no trabaja, no hace nada.

translation.en: And she's always eating my food.
translation.es: Y se la pasa comiendo mi comida.

translation.en: Did she just start eating your food today?
She didn't just start eating my food today,
but what if she moves out and is no longer paying the rent?
translation.es: pero si ella se va y él dice que no pagará la renta,

translation.en: What would I do? Where would I go?
Okay. Whenever I ask her where he lives,
translation.es: Bien, cada vez que le pregunto a ella dónde vive él,

translation.en: she says it's in Ikeja, it's in Along, or something else.
translation.es: ella dice que Ikeja, que Along, o cualquier otro lado.

translation.en: She has never once told me where he lives.
translation.es: No me dijo dónde vive ni una vez.

translation.en: She's never told me! What is Rose hiding?
translation.es: ¡Nunca me lo dijo! ¿Qué está ocultando Rose?

translation.en: - What exactly is she hiding? - Why don't you just ask her?
translation.es: - ¿Qué esconde exactamente? - ¿Por qué no le preguntas?

translation.en: I should ask her? Have you not heard anything I've been saying?
translation.es: ¿Que le pregunte? ¿No escuchaste nada de lo que te dije?

translation.en: All this, I'm tired.
I'm tired of all this stress.
That reminds me, the business you wanted to do,
translation.es: Eso me recuerda. Ese negocio que querías hacer,

translation.en: is your uncle giving you money for it?
No.
I don't want him in my business at all.
translation.es: No lo quiero metido en esto.

translation.en: Why?
When I establish this business, starts going well, bringing in money,
translation.es: Cuando el negocio funcione y comience a ir bien y generar dinero,

translation.en: it'll mean I'm set and can be on my own.
Ah, that's good but,
where will you get money?
What do you think I've been running around for?
But, it would be too late.
That would take too long.
translation.es: Tomaría demasiado tiempo. ¿Qué tal si te doy lo poco que me queda de mis ahorros,

translation.en: I suggest I give you what little I have left of my savings,
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si te doy lo poco que me queda de mis ahorros,

translation.en: so you can add it to the money you have. Eh?
translation.es: para que lo agregues al dinero que tú tienes?

translation.en: And then you can start from there.
Tolani, I didn't come here to beg for money.
translation.es: Tolani, no vine aquí buscando dinero.

translation.en: I know, Sanwo, I know you didn't come here to beg for money,
translation.es: Lo sé, Sanwo. Sé que no viniste por dinero,

translation.en: but it'll take too long.
Too long before you have enough .
Let me help you out.
What is happening?
- Ayo! - Yes?
- What are you doing there? - I'm playing.
You're playing? Look, let your mother catch you there, you'll be in real trouble.
translation.es: ¿Jugando? Mira, si tu madre te ve, te meterás en un gran lío hoy.

translation.en: You're playing. Where is Philomena?
I don't know.
You don't know? Doesn't she know how much your mother pays her
translation.es: ¿No sabes? ¿No sabe cuánto le paga tu madre

translation.en: to watch over you guys, and you're playing all over the place.
translation.es: para cuidar de ustedes? ¡Y ustedes corriendo por todos lados!

translation.en: Would you get off that place you're playing?
translation.es: ¿Se pueden mover de ahí donde están jugando?

translation.en: These children!
What is it? Should I let him hurt himself?
- Tolani. - Hmm?
The money you talked about earlier,
uh, I have thought about it.
I'll take whatever amount you have. And I'll pay it back.
translation.es: Tomaré lo que puedas darme. Te lo devolveré.

translation.en: Uh- huh.
But, I can't take the money from you,
translation.es: Pero, no puedo aceptarte el dinero,

translation.en: when you're like this.
I hear you. I'll calm down until you're done.
translation.es: Te escuché. Me calmaré cuando termines.

translation.en: You can have it.
- Thank you. - Bye.
Can you get me the file, please?
What file, sir?
Hmm, quarterly budget.
- Mr. Salako! - Who is that?
Can't you knock?!
Can't you knock? See how her mouth is open.
- I thought you said I should come in. - No! I didn't say so.
translation.es: - Creí escucharlo decir que pasara. - ¡No! ¡No dije eso!

translation.en: I didn't say. When did I say so?
Get out! Get out.
What's that?
What can I do for you?
There's a messenger from First Bank, they asked to see you.
translation.es: Hay un mensajero del First Bank, pide por usted.

translation.en: Mm, tell the person to wait. Tell him to wait.
I'm busy. And let me warn you,
next time you, you come in like that, I will sack you.
translation.es: La próxima vez que entres así, te despediré.

translation.en: Come on, go, go. Leave my office.
- Okay. - Mm.
Get the hell out. Keep on walking aimlessly.
Be going!
Where's the file?
- Here's the file, sir. - Let me have it!
Look at her.
Always walking seductively, shaking her butt.
translation.es: Caminando tan sensual, moviendo el trasero.

translation.en: I know what you're doing.
Tolani, this is what I'm saying.
translation.es: Tolani, esto es lo que digo…

translation.en: You see, whatever the world about a person is not always who the person is.
translation.es: Verás, lo que el mundo dice de una persona, no es lo que esa persona es.

translation.en: The person might not see themselves in that light.
translation.es: Esa persona puede pensar diferente de sí misma.

translation.en: Let me give you an example.
If a man comes and says,
translation.es: Si un hombre viene y dice:

translation.en: Ah, this girl is well mannered, she's virtuous, she's honorable.
translation.es: Esta chica tiene buenos modales, es virtuosa, honorable.

translation.en: Within you, you know it's possible that you're not all those things.
translation.es: Dentro de ti sabes que quizá no seas esas cosas.

translation.en: Do you understand?
The point I'm trying to make is this.
translation.es: Lo que quiero decir es esto.

translation.en: If you know you're well- mannered, virtuous, and honorable,
translation.es: Si tú sabes que tienes buenos modales, que eres virtuosa, honorable,

translation.en: you make sure to protect your reputation.
translation.es: te asegurarás de proteger todo lo que eres.

translation.en: You won't let life or any man take it away from you.
translation.es: No dejarás que la vida, ni ningún hombre, te lo quite.

translation.en: - Do you understand? - I understand, Mom.
- Are you sure? - I understand.
OC.
What kind of job do you do that you make this much money?
translation.es: ¿De qué trabajas tú para ganar tanto dinero?

translation.en: Hmm?
I'm asking because I want to make my own money.
translation.es: Te pregunto porque quiero ganar dinero también.

translation.en: You have a passport?
- Passport? Yes I have plenty of passports. - No, not that type.
translation.es: - ¿Pases? Sí, tengo varios pases. - No, ese tipo no.

translation.en: An international passport.
No, I don't.
Why?
You should've told me.
I've been suspecting that you were doing something illegal. But I didn't know what.
translation.es: Pensé que estarías metido en algo ilegal, pero no sabía qué.

translation.en: I thought you were, um, trading dollars on the black market.
translation.es: Pensé que intercambiabas dólares en el mercado negro.

translation.en: I knew it was something illegal.
Listen, OC, I can do it.
translation.es: Escucha, O. C., yo puedo hacerlo.

translation.en: I'm not afraid.
I can do it.
Trust me.
Listen, when I was growing up, all these stupid old men started touching me,
translation.es: Mira, cuando era joven, muchos viejos estúpidos me manoseaban

translation.en: but I learned how to fight them.
translation.es: pero aprendí a luchar contra ellos.

translation.en: But poverty?
That's a different thing altogether. And I don't want to face it again.
translation.es: Eso es algo completamente distinto. No quiero volver a eso jamás.

translation.en: I… I do not really know how to put this…
but, uh, certain information just reached my attention,
translation.es: pero cierta información me ha llamado la atención.

translation.en: and I want to know if it is true.
translation.es: Y quiero saber si es verdad.

translation.en: What information?
Were you and Salako caught in flagrante delicto?
translation.es: ¿Te atraparon a ti y a Salako in flagranti delicto?

translation.en: What does that mean?
Well you know… you know, um…
Well?
Tell Franca to stay away from me.
translation.es: Dile a Franka que se aleje de mí.

translation.en: That is not… I mean, that is not part of the issue here.
translation.es: Eso no es… Eso no es el asunto aquí.

translation.en: Really? Then you are like her then.
Tolani!
I'm sorry, uncle, I don't have time for this. Please, beans for me.
translation.es: Lo siento, no tengo tiempo para esto. Habas, por favor.

translation.en: Ayo!
Ayo! Eh!
We need a longer stick.
This is the only stick we could find.
translation.es: Ese es el más largo que encontré.

translation.en: Go across the road, there are bamboo sticks there.
translation.es: Cruza hasta donde está el sastre. Hay palos de bambú ahí.

translation.en: I don't want those people to know what is happening in this compound.
translation.es: No quiero que la gente del sastre sepa lo que pasa en este barrio.

translation.en: Go there, don't let them know what's happening here.
translation.es: Ve, y que no se enteren de qué está pasando.

translation.en: Please help me go and collect a longer stick.
translation.es: Por favor, ayúdame a buscar allá un palo más largo.

translation.en: Ayo.
Tolani!
Where is the stick? It is taking time.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde está el palo? - Espera un momento.

translation.en: Ayo fell into the septic tank. We're trying to get him out.
translation.es: Ayo se cayó en el tanque. Intentamos sacarlo.

translation.en: That Philomena is wicked.
- Where is she exactly? - She ran away.
If I see her, I'll personally beat her up. Then call the police to arrest her for me.
translation.es: Si la veo, la moleré a golpes. Llamaré a la policía y que la arresten.

translation.en: The stick now! The stick. It's taking a long time.
translation.es: ¡Traigan el palo ya! ¡El palo! Se tardan demasiado.

translation.en: They're bringing it.
Ayo!
Somebody help me! Somebody help me!
Ayo!
Ayo!
Ayo, why?
- Ayo. - Where is he?
- Ayo. - Which Ayo?
I'm dead! Ayo!
I am dead! Help me bring him out!
- Don't let me lose my child, please! - Mama Ayo!
translation.es: - ¡Que mi hijo no se muera! - ¡Ay, mamá Ayo!

translation.en: Please!
- Mama Ayo! - Help me carry him!
Mama Chidi!
Take her away from here now. Help me bring him out!
Sorry for your loss.
- May we not have any more loss. - So sorry.
translation.es: - Ojalá no perdamos a nadie más. - Lo lamento.

translation.en: Mother, They said I should do my hair before school tomorrow.
translation.es: Madre, dijeron que debía peinarme para ir a la escuela mañana.

translation.en: God will comfort you.
Mother, why are you not talking?
Don't cry again.
Take heart. Sorry for your loss.
Stop crying. God will look… God will be with you both.
translation.es: Deja de llorar. Dios cuidará de ustedes.

translation.en: Don't start crying again.
translation.es: No empieces a llorar de nuevo.

translation.en: See that boy.
What is he doing there?
- What is he doing this time of night? - Let's go find out.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hace a esta hora? - Vamos a preguntarle.

translation.en: What are you doing here at this time?
It's so late.
Isn't your mother looking for you?
Where did you come from?
- Get up. - Get up and go home!
What are you all doing there?
Move out the way. Is that not Ayo?
I said move out of the way! Or are you deaf?
Get away! Leave him alone.
What are you doing over there?
Your mother has been looking for you all over the place.
translation.es: Tu madre te está buscando por todos lados.

translation.en: All right. Let's go home. She'll beat me.
translation.es: - Bien, vamos a casa. - Me pegará.

translation.en: Your mother won't beat you. Don't worry, let's go home.
translation.es: Tu madre no te pegará. Tranquilo. Vamos a casa.

translation.en: Come on.
- My life! - Ayo!
Have mercy on me. Please!
- It's okay. - Help me get him, Mama Chidi.
God will help.
Excuse me. Excuse me, please.
- Thank you God! - Ayo!
Where did you find him?!
God, I thank you sir.
Congratulations on the good luck!
- Where did you find him? - Ask him yourself.
- Ayo! - Thank you, God!
Thank you, God! Neighbors, thank you.
Ayo.
Oh, my goodness! Yes, Yemi is going closer.
Yes. He stands a chance and… and… and it's a goal!
Goal!
Take it.
- Wait a minute. - Hmm?
What kind of business is this exactly?
Fine. Do you remember my friend, Moshood?
Who?
Have you forgotten Moshood?
That man that drives a Volkswagen Beetle around?
translation.es: ¿El que anda con un Volkswagen Beetle por ahí?

translation.en: That's him. You know he knows a lot of soldiers.
translation.es: Ese mismo. Sabes que conoce a muchos soldados.

translation.en: He imports dogs for them to protect their homes.
translation.es: Importa perros para ellos, para cuidar de sus casas.

translation.en: Dogs like Dobermans, Alsatian, Rottweiler.
Imported dogs, not all those local mongrels.
translation.es: Perros importados, no esos mestizos locales.

translation.en: It's a very profitable venture. I've done my research.
translation.es: Es un negocio redituable. Yo investigué sobre esto.

translation.en: In fact, we should triple the initial investment.
translation.es: De hecho, deberíamos triplicar la inversión inicial.

translation.en: I can assure you. I've done my research.
That's good. Give me my money.
I took my savings from all the hard work I've been doing since the year started,
translation.es: Trabajé mucho desde principio de año para ahorrar eso

translation.en: and I gave it to you and you're talking to me about Moshood and dogs?
translation.es: y te lo di a ti y ahora tú me dices que Moshood esto, que los perros aquello.

translation.en: I thought you had a real business partner.
translation.es: Pensé que tenías un socio de verdad.

translation.en: Or a good business plan.
translation.es: O un buen plan de negocio.

translation.en: Give me my money back. Thank you.
So, you don't even trust me.
translation.es: O sea, no confías en mí.

translation.en: After I told you I had done all my research.
translation.es: Luego de que te dijera que investigué a fondo.

translation.en: Okay. It's not like I wanted your money before. I'm not starving. Take.
translation.es: Bien, yo ni siquiera quería tu dinero. No tengo hambre. Toma.

translation.en: All right, have some patience. Don't be angry.
translation.es: Ten un poco de paciencia. No te enfades.

translation.en: I'm just being cautious.
translation.es: Debes saber cómo suena este negocio.

translation.en: This is all my life savings.
translation.es: Son los ahorros de toda mi vida.

translation.en: I'm just scared. Don't be angry.
All right, take.
Take.
I trust you.
Make sure you give me my profit.
Okay, continue eating. Eat your food.
translation.es: Bueno, ahora termina tu comida. Come tu comida.

translation.en: Eat. You have too much pride.
Stop being insolent. I'm not going anywhere.
translation.es: No iré a ningún lado. Debo quedarme aquí.

translation.en: We must finish this discussion.
translation.es: - Acabaremos esta discusión. Te lo dije. - ¿Qué?

translation.en: Finish what? What gives you the right to come here and question me?
translation.es: - Acabaremos esta discusión. Te lo dije. - ¿Qué? ¿Quién te dio derecho a venir a cuestionarme?

translation.en: Really?
- My friend, get out. - What is going on here?
translation.es: - Por favor, vete. - ¿Qué está pasando aquí?

translation.en: Tell him to get out.
I'll go. But not until I say my peace.
translation.es: Me iré, pero no hasta que diga lo que pienso.

translation.en: Say what? Leave!
Is that so? Your friend? She's not okay. She bit me
translation.es: ¿Ah sí? Tu amiga no está bien. Me mordió.

translation.en: So you don't want to leave?
translation.es: ¿No te quieres ir? No te quieres ir, ¿no?

translation.en: You don't want to leave?
Ah, look, don't mind her. I only just told her to be careful of OC.
translation.es: Mira, no le prestes atención. Solo le dije que se cuidara de O. C.

translation.en: Why?
They had a big fight! It was explosive!
You should've heard the things he said.
translation.es: Hubieras escuchado lo que dijo ella.

translation.en: Okay, you don't want to leave? Stay there! Stay there like a soldier.
translation.es: Bien, ¿no te quieres ir? ¡Quédate ahí! Quieto como un soldado.

translation.en: You and I will have it out. Stay. Wait.
translation.es: Tú y yo vamos a pelear. Quieto ahí. Espera.

translation.en: Ooh. You two broke up over a year ago,
translation.es: Se separaron hace más de un año

translation.en: and I'm still here settling your quarrels. I'm surprised.
translation.es: y todavía tengo que arreglar sus peleas. Qué sorpresa.

translation.en: You should've heard the things OC said. You would be shocked.
translation.es: Debiste escuchar lo que O. C. dijo de ella. Te habrías sorprendido.

translation.en: What things?
Tell me.
All right, let's put it this way.
translation.es: Bueno, para decirlo de alguna manera.

translation.en: A man cannot respect you, if he insults you like that.
translation.es: Un hombre no puede respetarte si es grosero.

translation.en: What! I can't believe this is happening, you know.
I must be dreaming, you know.
- How dare you talk back, hungry whore! - No, I-- What…
translation.es: - ¿Cómo me contestas así, puta hambrienta? - No te hubiese dicho…

translation.en: You hungry whore!
- Did you hear what he called me? - She's not good in bed.
translation.es: ¿Escuchaste lo que me dijo? ¡Tu madre es…!

translation.en: She's not good in bed you know! You can't be compared to my girl
translation.es: ¡No es buena en la cama! ¡No te puedes comparar a mi chica!

translation.en: - Natasha in Chicago! - I've slept with better men than you!
translation.es: - ¡Natasha en Chicago! - Dormí con mejores hombres.

translation.en: You can't be compared to my girl Amanda in Atlanta!
translation.es: - ¡Amanda en Atlanta! - ¡No te culpo! No das la talla.

translation.en: - Go back to Atlanta! - You can't be compared to my girl Aliya - What are you doing here? - You know!
translation.es: - ¡Ni con Aliya en Nueva York! - ¡Vuelve a Atlanta! ¿Por qué estás aquí?

translation.en: Babe, talk to your friend.
I only met OC four years ago and since that time, he's been living in the United States.
translation.es: Conocí a O. C. hace solo cuatro años y desde entonces vive en Estados Unidos.

translation.en: I don't even know what he does there.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sé qué hace allá.

translation.en: - You said he was your friend! - Yo! Everyone is my friend.
translation.es: - Dijiste que era tu amigo. - ¡Oye! Todos son mis amigos.

translation.en: - I'm surprised at you Johnny. - Me? Is that so? She was my girl!
translation.es: - Me sorprendes, Johnny. - ¿Yo? ¿En serio? ¡Ella es mi chica!

translation.en: She's the one that decided to jump ship and date OC.
translation.es: Ella decidió abandonarme y salir con O. C.

translation.en: You won't leave!
- You should stay so I can stab you! - What is wrong with you?
translation.es: - ¡Quédate, así te apuñalo! - ¿Cuál es tu problema?

translation.en: - Please leave me! Leave me! - Ah! What is wrong with you?
I come in here and both of you are acting like area boys.
translation.es: Llego y los encuentro actuando como si fueran Area Boys.

translation.en: Nobody cares about Rose. Every man just wants to use Rose.
translation.es: A nadie le importa Rose. Todos los hombres quieren usar a Rose.

translation.en: How many things has Johnny ever bought for me?
Coming here asking me questions, monitoring my movement.
translation.es: Tiene la insolencia de cuestionarme y controlarme.

translation.en: Buy is not love. As for OC,
translation.es: Comprar no es amar. Y en cuanto a O. C.,

translation.en: if he really insults you like that, then he does not like you. You hear me?
translation.es: si de verdad te insultó así, entonces no te quiere. ¿Escuchaste?

translation.en: He does not like you. It's a mistake to be with that man.
translation.es: No le gustas. Es un error involucrarse con él.

translation.en: Don't tell me that. I know what I'm doing.
translation.es: ¡No me digas eso! No es un error. Sé lo que hago.

translation.en: A mistake is somebody that walks around
translation.es: Un error es alguien que cree

translation.en: thinking the world would change because of them.
translation.es: que el mundo cambiará gracias a ellos.

translation.en: Very good. You can do anything you want!
translation.es: ¡Muy bien! ¡Puedes hacer lo que quieras con quien quieras!

translation.en: With whoever you want. In fact, you can go anywhere with whoever you want.
translation.es: ¡Muy bien! ¡Puedes hacer lo que quieras con quien quieras! De hecho, puedes ir donde quieras con quien quieras.

translation.en: But let me remind you, I live in this house and I pay my rent.
translation.es: Pero déjame recordarte que yo vivo aquí y pago la renta.

translation.en: So if you give me problems, I will give you problems back!
translation.es: Así que si me causas problemas, yo te los causaré a ti.

translation.en: I will give you problems back.
Go, walk away and don't hear what I'm saying.
translation.es: Si quieres vete y no me escuches.

translation.en: Look at the mess.
It's true that I don't have anybody in Lagos to help me.
translation.es: Es verdad que no tengo a nadie en Lagos que me ayude.

translation.en: But please, if I'm going to work for you, don't insult me like that again.
translation.es: Pero por favor, si trabajaré para ti, no vuelvas a insultarme así.

translation.en: I'm begging you.
- Miss Tolani Ajao. - Yes, sir?
Uh, please, check that cabinet and get me a file.
translation.es: Por favor, abre el gabinete y dame un archivo.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I cannot, sir.
- Why not? - My leg.
Your leg? What is wrong about your leg? What happened?
translation.es: ¿La pierna? ¿Qué te pasó en la pierna? ¿Qué pasó?

translation.en: I fell down on the bus, and it's paining me, sir.
translation.es: Me caí en el autobús y me duele, señor.

translation.en: Oh. Stop being deceptive. You fell down?
- You? You fall out from a bus? - Yes sir.
translation.es: - ¿Tú? Te caíste del autobús. - Sí, señor.

translation.en: And you did not somersault? You didn't somersault like a monkey?
translation.es: ¿No diste una voltereta? ¿Diste volteretas como un mono?

translation.en: - Uh, when was this? - Today.
- Today? - Yes, sir.
Okay, show me.
I twisted it, so you cannot see it.
translation.es: Me lo doblé. No se ve nada.

translation.en: Show me.
- This is it, sir. - Ah.
You're telling a lie. It's a lie. You're lying.
translation.es: Estás mintiendo. Es mentira. Estás mintiendo.

translation.en: Ah! This thing did not happen today. This one did not happen today. Stop lying!
translation.es: Esto no pasó hoy. Esto no pasó hoy. Deja de mentir.

translation.en: It's still paining me, sir, and I cannot bend until it heals.
translation.es: Todavía me duele, señor. No puedo inclinarme hasta que sane.

translation.en: - Really? - Yes, sir.
All right. Then you take a memo for me.
Yes, sir.
I'm going to make you so miserable
until you'll realize who is the boss, you worthless thing.
translation.es: Entenderás que soy el jefe, inútil.

translation.en: I'm here, sir.
To personnel. Regarding Tolani Ajao.
translation.es: Para recursos humanos, en referencia a Tolani Ajao.

translation.en: I wish to lay an official complaint about my secretary.
translation.es: Quiero presentar una queja oficial sobre mi secretaria.

translation.en: Miss Tolani Ajao.
This morning,
I asked her to get me a file from my cabinet,
translation.es: le pedí un archivo de mi gabinete,

translation.en: and she refused bluntly.
She became recalcitrant.
How do you spell that, sir?
Check your dictionary, dullard. Didn't you go to school?
translation.es: Búscalo en el diccionario, burra. ¿No fuiste a la escuela?

translation.en: And when you're asked you're quick to say you understand English.
translation.es: Y luego dices que sabes hablar inglés.

translation.en: But you don't know how to spell a simple word.
translation.es: Y no puedes escribir una simple palabra.

translation.en: Recalcitrant. Ah.
Make sure you type the memo for me.
Yes, sir.
Wait a minute, what do you call yourself?
Eh? Who do you think you are?
And you are just a commoner. An ordinary person.
- Is that also part of the memo, sir? - That is your own cup of tea.
translation.es: - ¿Eso es parte del memo, señor? - Como tú quieras.

translation.en: If you don't know. Write your response for records purposes.
translation.es: Como si no supieras. Escribe tu respuesta que conste en actas.

translation.en: I will.
Get out of my sight. I'll make sure your job is history.
translation.es: Vete de mi vista, o haré que te quedes sin empleo.

translation.en: I'm going to frustrate you. You worthless thing.
I notice a missing semicolon in your response.
translation.es: Noto que falta un punto y coma en tu respuesta.

translation.en: I'll write it in, sir.
And a misplaced predicate.
translation.es: Y un error en el predicado.

translation.en: Unfortunately, you'll have to type it out again.
translation.es: Por desgracia, deberás escribirlo de nuevo.

translation.en: Why?
An employee cannot amend internal documents by hand.
translation.es: Un empleado no puede reparar documentación interna a mano.

translation.en: If everyone does that,
then we won't be able to differentiate the originals from the fakes.
translation.es: no podríamos diferenciar los originales de las copias.

translation.en: I'll type it in if that's what you want, sir.
translation.es: Lo volveré a escribir, si eso quieres.

translation.en: At any rate, I cannot accept this response as it stands.
translation.es: En cualquier caso, no puedo aceptar una respuesta así.

translation.en: Why not?
Your allegations, they're rather… shocking.
translation.es: Tus alegatos son un poco… sorprendentes.

translation.en: Of course! What happened to me shocked me too.
translation.es: ¡Claro! Lo que pasó me sorprendió también.

translation.en: It's unprecedented and I don't think I… I can file it.
translation.es: No tiene precedentes y creo que no puedo archivarlo.

translation.en: And why not?
Mr. Salako is a married man.
translation.es: El señor Salako es un hombre casado.

translation.en: Your madam too is a married woman.
translation.es: Tu señora es una mujer casada también.

translation.en: And I've never heard of her assaulting anyone.
translation.es: Nunca escuché que ella atacara a nadie.

translation.en: Look.
For as long as I've been supervisor in personnel,
translation.es: Desde que trabajo como supervisor en Recursos Humanos,

translation.en: I have never discussed this kind of case with her.
translation.es: nunca discutí un caso así con ella.

translation.en: Now, do you realize the implications of what you're doing?
translation.es: ¿Te das cuenta de las consecuencias de lo que estás haciendo?

translation.en: Yes.
All right.
Ah. So you don't even want to speak to us any longer.
translation.es: Entonces no quieres hablar más con nosotros.

translation.en: Anyway, I understand.
Anyone asking me now, What's happening to Tolani?
translation.es: Si alguien me pregunta: ¿Qué pasa con Tolani?,

translation.en: I just tell them Leave her alone.
She's working for Salako now.
Ah! And it cannot be easy.
Ah! You know, learning a new--
Be quiet! Keep your mouth shut!
- Me? - Yes.
And if you don't keep quiet, you will end up on this ground.
translation.es: Si no te callas, acabarás en el suelo.

translation.en: - Are you talking to me? - I'm talking to you.
translation.es: ¿Me hablas a mí? Te hablo a ti.

translation.en: Don't say another word, or you will live to regret it.
translation.es: No digas una palabra más, o te arrepentirás.

translation.en: Ah! Show her some respect now.
Why are you threatening to fight her in public?
Hey! Uncle, please, mind your own business. Okay?
translation.es: Por favor, métete en tus cosas, ¿sí?

translation.en: Mind your business. Look, let me tell you, I'm happy you're all here.
translation.es: Métete en tus cosas. Escuchen, me alegra que estén todos.

translation.en: Listen to me, because I will not repeat myself.
translation.es: Escuchen bien porque no lo repetiré.

translation.en: Do not speak to me! Do not question me!
translation.es: No me hablen, no me cuestionen.

translation.en: Because I don't owe any of you any explanation.
translation.es: Porque no le debo a nadie ninguna explicación.

translation.en: I have filed my report.
And you people can continue to spread your stupid rumors.
translation.es: Ustedes pueden seguir desparramando rumores estúpidos.

translation.en: - Leave her alone. - Nonsense.
Just leave her alone. Look at her.
Dismissing Ignatius like a little boy.
translation.es: Descartó a Ignatius como si fuera un niño.

translation.en: God only knows who she's connected to.
She might open her legs now and get all of us all fired.
translation.es: Podría abrir las piernas y despedirnos a todos.

translation.en: Eh! You have word. Imagine. Face in front, let's buy our food.
translation.es: - Tienes razón. - Imagínatelo. - Miren hacia adelante. Compremos comida. - Míralos, idiotas.

translation.en: Look at them, idiots.
translation.es: - Miren hacia adelante. Compremos comida. - Míralos, idiotas.

translation.en: - I told you she's very wicked. - Tolani?
Hey! Can you see for yourself now?
Imagine.
Leave Tolani there. She and Rose, birds of the same feather.
translation.es: Déjala. Ella y Rose son iguales.

translation.en: So please, let's buy food.
Tolani!
What?
Don't you want to eat anymore?
- What's your business? - Oh, you want to fight me too?
Why are you so bothered about Franca? Let me tell you, she's an unhappy woman.
translation.es: ¿Por qué te molestas con Franka? Es una mujer infeliz.

translation.en: Her husband beats her every day.
translation.es: Su esposo le pega todos los días.

translation.en: I'm very happy to hear that.
How can you say that now? You should pray for your enemies.
translation.es: ¿Qué dices? Debes rezar por tus enemigos.

translation.en: Why? So that they can destroy me.
I'm sure you don't mean that.
You're carrying a very heavy burden.
I'm here to encourage you, put your trust in the Lord.
translation.es: Estoy aquí para alentarte. Confía en Dios.

translation.en: He's forever faithful.
Anytime you're available, I want to invite you to my church.
translation.es: Cuando estés disponible, quiero invitarte a mi iglesia.

translation.en: Me, I'm not interested in going to any born- again church.
translation.es: No me interesa ninguna iglesia de nacido de nuevo.

translation.en: I'm not interested in any revival or anything like that
I'm just inviting you now.
As you're seeing me, my father was an Ifa worshipper.
translation.es: Así como me ves, mi padre era adorador de Ifa.

translation.en: Wow. I'm so sorry to hear that.
Sorry to hear what?
Nothing, oh. Nothing.
It's just most people that I know are either Christians or Muslims.
translation.es: La mayoría de la gente que conozco son cristianos o musulmanes.

translation.en: Even if they worship other gods on the side.
translation.es: Incluso cuando adoran a otros dioses.

translation.en: Anyway, my mother is a Christian.
translation.es: De todos modos, mi madre es cristiana.

translation.en: And I was baptized and confirmed.
Praise the Lord. That's so beautiful. I salute you, my sister.

translation.en: Don't worry, I'll be back at work tomorrow.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Regresaré al trabajo mañana.

translation.en: Ah, nice.
I'm so glad you are able to make it. Your boss needs serious prayers.
