translation.en: When does this service end?
It's just two hours.
Two!
Hallelujah!
Amen!
If you're happy to be in the presence of the Lord, say hallelujah!
translation.es: Si están felices de estar en Su presencia, digan aleluya.

translation.en: Hallelujah!
My God is good.
All the time!
All right, can we sit down?
Father said to me…
He said, Fred, look at yourself.
Do you think it's because you're so special,
that you have been so blessed that you fly first class?
translation.es: por haber sido bendecido por volar en primera clase?.

translation.en: The secret to prosperity, you don't need to go to worship some God.
translation.es: El secreto de la prosperidad: No necesitan adorar a un Dios.

translation.en: Just follow the rules of the law.
- Hallelujah! - Amen!
If we turn our Bible to Acts 4:12.
translation.es: Si abrimos nuestras Biblias en el versículo 4:12.

translation.en: It says salvation! I didn't say it.
translation.es: Dice salvación. Yo no lo dije.

translation.en: The Holy Bible says salvation
translation.es: La Biblia dice: Y en ningún otro hay salvación, excepto ¿en quién?

translation.en: is found in no one else except who?
translation.es: Y en ningún otro hay salvación, excepto ¿en quién?

translation.en: - Jesus Christ! - Jesus Christ! Amen!
- Amen! - Amen, pastor!
Jesus!
In the Book of John 14, and he says,
translation.es: En el Libro de Juan 14, Él dice:

translation.en: I am the way, the truth…
translation.es: Yo soy el camino, la verdad….

translation.en: Good morning, Father.
Ah, good morning. Did you sleep well?
Yes, Father.
What are you dressed up for?
We're going to church.
You're going to church?
You've started following them to church?
- Yes. -
That's fine. Let me just make one thing clear to you.
I don't want you to tell your mother, do you understand?
translation.es: No quiero que le digas a tu madre, ¿comprendes?

translation.en: Yes, Father.
If you have any problems,
you should pray to Orunmila.
Orunmila is the spirit of wisdom.
translation.es: Orunmila es el espíritu de la sabiduría.

translation.en: All the deities that God created, were created to help us.
translation.es: Todas las deidades que Dios creó, fueron creadas para ayudarnos.

translation.en: You see, Sango and Ogun,
they are deities who help give all men strength and courage.
translation.es: son deidades que ayudan a los hombres a ganar coraje y fuerza.

translation.en: And you see Yemoja, ah, she's a compassionate woman.
translation.es: Verás, Yemoja es una mujer compasiva.

translation.en: Then you see the deity called Osun.
translation.es: Luego, tienes la deidad llamada Osun.

translation.en: Ah, she's the deity for children.
translation.es: Es la deidad para los niños.

translation.en: She's the deity for plentiful children. Anybody that's infertile, prays to Osun.
translation.es: Es la deidad que ayuda a tener niños. Los que son infértiles le rezan a Osun.

translation.en: Keep it in mind, I don't want you to forget.
translation.es: Recuérdalo. No quiero que lo olvides.

translation.en: Jesus loves us so much. He gave his life!
translation.es: Jesús nos ama tanto que dio su vida

translation.en: So that you and I can survive.
translation.es: para que tú y yo podamos sobrevivir.

translation.en: But he asks for nothing, except this token, offering and tithe.
translation.es: Pero no pide nada, excepto una prueba, la ofrenda y el diezmo.

translation.en: If you do that, you're gonna start flying first class, amen!
translation.es: Si hacen eso, comenzarán a volar en primera clase. ¡Amén!

translation.en: Amen!
You are gonna build that mansion tomorrow!
Amen!
You're gonna be driving a Mercedes Benz.
Amen!
If you wanna have all that, tell your brother, say I am blessed.
translation.es: Si quieren tener todo eso, díganle a su hermano: Estoy bendecido.

translation.en: I am blessed!
Tolani!
What now?
I'm sorry.
It's okay. You are just overcome.
I'm not. I'm just tired. I want to go home.
translation.es: No es eso. Estoy cansada. Quiero ir a casa.

translation.en: Home, why?
Your pastor is brainwashing you.
translation.es: Tu pastor te lavó el cerebro.

translation.en: Every Sunday you sit there and listen to him say all sorts of nonsense.
translation.es: Cada domingo te sientas ahí y lo escuchas decir tonterías.

translation.en: He's already rich.
But you're still giving him your money. How does that make any sense?
translation.es: Pero aún así le das tu dinero. ¿Qué sentido tiene?

translation.en: That's not for me to question.
Godwin, it is. That's why God gave you a brain.
translation.es: Godwin, es así. Por eso Dios te dio un cerebro.

translation.en: Ah! It's already good enough that you're a Christian,
translation.es: Ya está bien que eres cristiano,

translation.en: but why must you… I saw you there! Pretending to speak in tongues.
translation.es: pero ¿por qué…? ¡Yo te vi! Fingiendo hablar en lenguas.

translation.en: Why? As if it's not bad enough,
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Como si no fuera poco,

translation.en: he's still condemning everybody else's faith and saying one way is the only way.
translation.es: sigue condenando la fe de los demás, dice que hay solo un camino.

translation.en: Why? Look, me, I'm going home.
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Mira, me iré a casa.

translation.en: Bitch!
I can't do it.
Rose, I cannot do it.
- Do what? -
I can't do it. Number one, I cannot swallow.
translation.es: No puedo hacerlo. Primero, no puedo tragarlas.

translation.en: Ah- ah. Did you repent or what is it?
Number two, I must have been crazy
translation.es: Número dos. Debo haberme vuelto loca

translation.en: to thought about doing something like that.
Over my mother's dead body.
translation.es: Por sobre el cadáver de mi madre.

translation.en: Never would I hide drugs inside my stomach.
translation.es: Nunca escondería drogas en mi estómago,

translation.en: I would not jump on a plane, and go and shit it out abroad.
translation.es: me subiría a un avión y luego ir a cagar a otro país.

translation.en: Never. I cannot do it.
I cannot.
- I had a revelation in that church. - Hmm.
translation.es: Tuve una revelación en la iglesia.

translation.en: People at the top will always take advantage of people like you and me.
translation.es: La gente en la cima siempre se aprovechará de las personas como tú y yo.

translation.en: Look at us. We are working for an organization
that does not care about you or me.
translation.es: a la que no le importas ni tú ni yo.

translation.en: I cannot do this. Never.
- Ah, Tolani. - I cannot.
It seems like this poverty is making you crazy.
translation.es: Parece que la pobreza te está volviendo loca.

translation.en: See how you're behaving like you're possessed.
For weeks now, you've been back and forth. What is it?
translation.es: Hace semanas que no te decides. ¿Qué pasa?

translation.en: Look, I don't care about OC.
translation.es: Mira, no me importa O. C.

translation.en: It is you Rose that I'm concerned for.
Yet you're backing out of the plan we both made.
translation.es: Pero te echas para atrás de nuestro plan.

translation.en: He will find somebody else. Eh?
Just like he found you. He will find somebody else.
translation.es: Como te encontró a ti, encontrará a otra persona.

translation.en: Don't go. Eh?
It's not worth it.
We will find another job. You will see.
What job? What job?
Do you know what that bastard called me?
A nobody.
- But he called me a commoner too. - Ooh.
translation.es: A mí también me dijo ordinaria.

translation.en: And you think that idiot
would write us a reference letter to look for another job?
translation.es: nos escribirá cartas de referencia para otro empleo?

translation.en: - What is this? - Salako.
Salako!
- Salako! - What is wrong with you?
How many times did I call you? You have offended my creator,
translation.es: ¿Cuántas veces te llamé? Ofendiste a mi creador,

translation.en: and you've also offended my dead father's creator.
translation.es: y ofendiste al creador de mi difunto padre.

translation.en: The gods are now ready to give you the punishment you deserve.
translation.es: Los dioses están listos para darte el castigo que mereces.

translation.en: The gods are ready to wreak havoc in your life.
translation.es: Los dioses están listos para crear caos en tu vida.

translation.en: What is wrong with this girl, for God's sake?
translation.es: ¿Qué le pasa a esta chica, por Dios?

translation.en: I will take my leave next week.
translation.es: Tomaré mi licencia la semana que viene.

translation.en: - Can you get out before I-- - And you will not sack me!
If you sack me, your job will be in jeopardy.
translation.es: Si me echas a mí, tu empleo estará en juego.

translation.en: Your first male son will run mad.
You are in trouble!
translation.es: - ¡Estás en problemas! - Tu hija mujer será violada.

translation.en: Your female child will get raped.
translation.es: - ¡Estás en problemas! - Tu hija mujer será violada. Será violada por muchos hombres. No será bueno para tus ancestros.

translation.en: She will get pregnant too.
translation.es: Será violada por muchos hombres. No será bueno para tus ancestros.

translation.en: - You're unwell. - She'll give birth to a bastard.
translation.es: - ¡Estás loca! - Quedará embarazada de un bastardo.

translation.en: - You'll get pregnant as well. - As for the remaining children you have,
translation.es: - Tú también. - Y el resto de tus hijos, los que están en la escuela, no terminarán de estudiar.

translation.en: any one of them that is still in school won't finish.
translation.es: los que están en la escuela, no terminarán de estudiar.

translation.en: And if they have finished, they will become aimless.
translation.es: Y los que terminen, serán vagabundos.

translation.en: - Abomination! - So shall it be.
In the name of Jesus it won't-- Jesus!
Witch! Spirit child!
Hey! Somebody help me, she'll kill me. Where are my glasses?

translation.en: Ah! Unfortunate person. Witch!
Morning.
He's busy.
But I need to see him.
I said he's busy.
He personally asked me to see him.
translation.es: Me pidió personalmente que lo viera.

translation.en: And he told me he doesn't want to see anybody.
translation.es: Y me dijo que no quiere ver a nadie.

translation.en: So I can't go inside. Is that what you're saying?
Is it?
Okay.
- Yes? - Sir, it's Tolani, sir.
Miss Franca is here to see you.
translation.es: La señora Franka vino a verlo.

translation.en: Sir, it's pertaining to the meeting we had yesterday.
translation.es: Señor, es sobre la reunión que tuvimos ayer.

translation.en: Tell her I'll see her tomorrow. Um, thank you, Miss Ajao.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I'm the only one who would talk to you.
translation.es: Soy el único que te hablaba aquí.

translation.en: So you pitied me?
I misjudged your character.
I'm sorry.
Anyway, Jesus still loves you.

translation.en: Okay.
What is he still doing there?
Maybe he's deliberating.
Still?
He has won. He dribbles and it's… and it's and it's in.
translation.es: Se la ganó. Hace una gambeta y entra, entra.

translation.en: And it's a goal!
Ah- ah! Tolani! I can't believe this is you.
translation.es: ¡Tolani! No puedo creer que seas tú.

translation.en: You!
You're worse than FIFA fans.
translation.es: Eres peor que los fanáticos del fútbol.

translation.en: My dear, I had to do it.
If not he won't have let me go.

translation.en: True. It's good. He's overbearing.

translation.en: Too much.
Maybe I should report you to the authorities,
so that they can stop you at the airport.
translation.es: así te detienen en el aeropuerto.

Same people that are behind it.
translation.es: La policía también está detrás de esto.

translation.en: - Hmm! - Go and report.
- - I'll report you too. After all, you were a part of it before you pulled out.
translation.es: Yo te denunciaré porque eras parte y te echaste para atrás.

translation.en: - I'm no longer scared. - Rose.
At least I'm not going to America, I'm going to England.
translation.es: Al menos no voy a Estados Unidos, voy a Inglaterra.

translation.en: There you just plead guilty.
They'll put you in prison and give you a small sentence.

translation.en: You serve your time, the end.
But in America, ah…
They throw you in a cell, where they can sexually harass you.

translation.en: God forbid.
I hear that in Bangkok, they throw them inside dungeons.

translation.en: Ah. They are worse than Africans.
Eh! And as for the Arabs.
Eh! Don't go near those ones.
- They'll just behead you. Very strict. -
translation.es: Ellos solo te cortan la cabeza. Son muy estrictos.

translation.en: I'm shocked. This is serious.
My sister, please forgive me for what I did the other day.
translation.es: Hermana, por favor. No te enfades por lo que hice el otro día.

translation.en: - You know, my life. - Hm.
The things I've seen.
The disappointment, everything, just…
Just makes me behave irrationally sometimes.
translation.es: A veces me hace actuar irracionalmente.

translation.en: So, I'm sorry.
Tolani, enter now. Come in.
Mama Chidi, good afternoon.
- Sit down. Welcome. - Thank you.
- How are you? - I'm fine.
You didn't go to church? No, ma, I didn't.
translation.es: - ¿No fuiste a la iglesia? - No, no fui.

translation.en: We have gone to Sunday mass and we are back.

translation.en: The children have eaten. Even I have eaten too.

translation.en: They're sleeping.
But Papa Chidi went to watch FIFA final.
translation.es: Pero papá Chidi fue a ver el partido final.

translation.en: Ooh. I have not been following.
Have you been following the matches?
No. I don't have time.
Mm. Okay. Um…
Rose has traveled.
And I'm thinking of going to my hometown next week.
translation.es: Pensaba en visitar mi pueblo natal la semana entrante.

translation.en: Really? I hope all is well?
- Yes, all is well, Mama Chidi. Thank you. - Okay.
translation.es: - Sí, todo está bien, mamá Chidi. Gracias. - Bien.

translation.en: So I wanted to ask you to please help us watch our place,
translation.es: Quería pedirle que por favor nos eche una mirada a la casa,

translation.en: 'till I come back.
I'm not going for long.
- Really? - Yes.
- How long are you gone? - Only one week.
- Only one week. Okay. - Just-- Yes.
- Please when you go, rest. Mm? - I will.
- Safe journey. - Thank you.
- Please, rest well. - I will.
Let me leave you to read your newspaper.
translation.es: La dejaré para que siga leyendo su periódico.

translation.en: No, it's just newspaper.
But eh, my sister, this drug thing is becoming very serious.
translation.es: Pero, hermana, esta cosa de las drogas se está poniendo grave.

translation.en: Everybody is carrying drugs, wanting to be rich.
translation.es: Todos llevan drogas, quieren ser ricos.

translation.en: They can't wait for God to bless them. Because they want big, big money.
translation.es: No esperan a que Dios los bendiga. Quieren mucho dinero.

translation.en: - Ah. Thank you very much, ma. - Mm. Okay.
- Rest. - Yes. Thank you.
Don't overwork yourself and forget to take care of yourself.
translation.es: No te sobrecargues y te olvides de cuidarte.

translation.en: Oh, what a moment at the finals against the Germans.
translation.es: ¡Qué momento! Es la final contra las máquinas alemanas.

translation.en: As you can see…
Here they go again. Passing the ball.
translation.es: Aquí van de nuevo. Pasan el balón.

translation.en: Yes, he moved it to Joseph Babatunde.
translation.es: Sí, se la pasó a Joseph Babatunde, Billy y de nuevo. ¡Dios mío! ¡Sí! ¡Casi! ¡Se acerca!

translation.en: Oh, my goodness. Yes! Nearly! Going closer!
translation.es: ¡Dios mío! ¡Sí! ¡Casi! ¡Se acerca! ¡Tiene una chance! ¡Y es gol!

translation.en: He stands a chance. And, it's a goal!
Beautiful one by the Golden Eaglets! Oh, what a game!
translation.es: ¡Un gol hermoso de los Golden Eaglets! ¡Qué juego!

translation.en: - Be still. Still. Hey! -
I'll kill you. I'll kill you. Be still, be still.
Good.
Are you listening? Are you listening?
Your friend is dead.
Shh! Be still! I want you to disappear.
Go to wherever you like, I don't care.
translation.es: Vete donde quieras, no me importa.

translation.en: Just get out of here before daybreak.
translation.es: Solo vete de aquí antes del amanecer.

translation.en: What happened to Rose?
Are you okay?
What's the problem?
Do you want me to call the hostess?
Burst bags.
She was a bad investment.
- Shh! - She was someone's daugh--
Don't even! Don't. Don't try it.
If you're looking for someone to blame, blame yourself!
translation.es: Si quieres culpar a alguien, ¡cúlpate a ti!

translation.en: You put too much doubt in her mind.
translation.es: Le llenaste la cabeza de dudas.

translation.en: Damn! You caused everything you know!
Hey! Shh. Shut up! Shut up.
Get out of this place by daybreak.
translation.es: Vete de aquí antes del amanecer.

translation.en: If I come back and meet you here, you're dead meat.
translation.es: Si regreso y te encuentro aquí, serás carne muerta.

translation.en: Dead meat!
And I warned you, Rose.
I warned you.
It took death for you to open up, Tolani.
translation.es: Necesitaste la muerte para abrirte, Tolani.

translation.en: Eh? All by yourself.
Facing all these difficulties.
You should've come home. Hmm?
Are you scared of your home? Do you have another mother?
translation.es: ¿Tienes miedo de tu hogar? ¿Tienes dos madres?

translation.en: Mommy…
You've taught me, and you made sure I can stand on my own.
translation.es: Me educaste, te aseguraste de que me valiera sola.

translation.en: Not in this kind of situation. Not when you're suffering, not when you're hungry.
translation.es: No en esta situación. No cuando sufres, no cuando tienes hambre.

translation.en: Look, right now, I'll boil some herbs for you.
translation.es: Mira, ahora mismo te herviré unas hierbas.

translation.en: For you bathe with and drink. Yes.
translation.es: Beberás algunas y te bañarás con otras.

translation.en: - Herbs? - Yes, herbs.
Can you see all that hollowness in your neck? It will fill up.
translation.es: ¿Ves los huecos en tu cuello? Eso te sanará.

translation.en: Let me quickly go make it. Go in and change.
translation.es: Te las prepararé rápido. Ve a cambiarte.

translation.en: I hear you.
May I never be unfortunate.
- Good morning, ma. - My dear.
Happy selling.
May you make sales.
- You too. - Thanks!
- Good morning, ma. - Good morning.
Tolani!
- Tolani. - Ma?
You have a visitor.
Who is it?
How'd you know I was here? I'm going to the market.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo supiste que estaba aquí? - Iré al mercado.

translation.en: When I get back, we'll finish our talk. Yes, ma.
translation.es: - Cuando vuelva, seguiremos conversando. - Sí, mamá.

translation.en: - Bye, ma. - Bye, ma.
Bye, my dear.
Have a seat.
You're surprised to see me, right?
Will you drink some water?
I will.
- Here. - Thank you.
Help me give thanks.
For what?
I found a job.
Where?
Consultancy firm.
What would you be doing there?
I'm in the accounting department.
At least you'll be able to move out.
Tolani, what happened?
I called your office,
Godwin said Salako sacked you for misconduct.
translation.es: Godwin dijo que Salako te echó por mala conducta.

translation.en: When I pressed him further,
he said Mrs. Archibong queried Salako and suspended him.
translation.es: dijo que la señora Archibong interrogó a Salako y lo suspendió.

translation.en: That suspension is how he'll lose his job.
translation.es: Esa suspensión le costará el empleo.

translation.en: May God let her read what I wrote in my report.
translation.es: Que Dios permita que ella lea lo que escribí en el informe.

translation.en: She'll see that Rose and I were not crazy.
translation.es: Verá que Rose y yo no estamos locas.

translation.en: He doesn't know who he's dealing with. He doesn't know your spirit.
translation.es: No sabe con quién se mete. No sabe lo terca que eres.

translation.en: What are you going to do now?
I don't know yet. I don't know.
translation.es: No sé aún. No lo sé.

translation.en: This is the money you loaned me.
Take it.
And I'll give you more before the end of the month.
translation.es: Te daré más antes de fin de mes.

translation.en: For the suffering you went through.
translation.es: Por lo que sufriste por mí.

translation.en: This is enough.
You tried.
It's not up to you to decide.
Thank you.
You did everything you could to try and drive me away.
translation.es: Hiciste todo lo posible por perseguirme.

translation.en: - It's not like that. - It's not like that? How is it then?
Can you not remember all the rubbish you did?
translation.es: ¿Con todo lo que hiciste, ya no recuerdas?

translation.en: - You're the one who did rubbish. - Me, doing rubbish?
Stop lying.
- Tolani. - Mm?
You know only rich people get married before they're 40.
translation.es: Sabes, solo los ricos se casan antes de los cuarenta años.

translation.en: I'm not important? Money is more important than me.
translation.es: ¿No es importante? El dinero es más importante que yo.

translation.en: Don't say that.
After all the trouble you caused me. You think I'll let you go that easily?
translation.es: Después de todos los problemas que me causaste, ¿crees que te dejaré ir tan fácilmente?

translation.en: That reminds me. I forgot to ask you, where's Rose?
translation.es: Eso me recuerda. Olvidé preguntarte. ¿Y Rose?

translation.en: Good afternoon.
Mama Chidi said she wasn't home.
translation.es: Mamá Chidi dijo que se fue.

translation.en: Rose has gone home.
That's good. We all need rest.
That reminds me, Sanwo, please,
translation.es: Casi lo olvido, Sanwo, por favor, dale esto al dueño

translation.en: help me give my landlord this one and give Violet this one.
translation.es: Casi lo olvido, Sanwo, por favor, dale esto al dueño y esto a Violeta.

translation.en: And you know my furniture? I want you to send it to me when you get to Lagos.
translation.es: Sabes, mis muebles, quiero que me los envíes cuando llegues a Lagos.

translation.en: Or maybe you should help me sell them and send the money.
translation.es: Quizá podrías ayudarme vendiéndolos y enviándome el dinero.

translation.en: Tolani. Say it one at a time.
translation.es: Tolani. Una cosa a la vez.

translation.en: All right, don't be upset. I'll write it all down.
translation.es: Bien, no te enfades. Te lo escribiré.

translation.en: But can I trust you to follow through?
- I've told you before, I'm not a bastard. - Alright, I've hear you. Don't be angry.
translation.es: - Ya te lo dije, no soy un maldito. - Lo sé, no te enfades.

translation.en: - Sorry. - No worries, sir.
